channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Celebration Kitchen
channel.desc: Matt Tebbutt looks ahead to the celebration of Diwali. Tony Singh, Nisha Parmar, and Seema Pankhania serve up celebratory recipes, whilst special guests Karenjeet Kaur Bains, Sonali Shah, and Shini Muthukrishnan share Diwali memories.
